hints.title: Villani's Hypocoercivity (Informal)
hints.content:
7198: :label: thm-villani-hypocoercivity-recap
7199: 
7200: For the kinetic Fokker-Planck equation with **non-convex** confining potential $U$:
7201: 
7202: If:
7203: 1. $\langle \nabla U(x), x \rangle \geq \alpha_U |x|^2$ for $|x|$ large (confinement)
7204: 2. $\gamma > 0$ (friction)
7205: 3. $\sigma_v^2 > 0$ (noise)
7206: 
7207: Then there exists $\lambda_{\text{hypo}} = c \cdot \min(\gamma, \alpha_U/\sigma_v^2) > 0$ such that:
7208: 
7209: $$
7210: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_t \| \pi_{\text{kin}}) \leq e^{-\lambda_{\text{hypo}} t} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_0 \| \pi_{\text{kin}})
7211: $$
